src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Well , thanks anyway . [MASK] ARI : Thank you very much . [MASK] LC : Can you tell me where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Oh , but I do n't know . RP : Is room 17 on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Normally , I have an appointment . RP : I have an appointment in room 17 . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So , where do the appointments take place ? Where are the appointments ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Do you have another number for me ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Okay well , thank you then . [MASK] LC : The appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . [MASK] RP : My appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RP : An appointment of ... gerontology . ARI : Of course . [MASK] RP : Where should I ... Where should I go in the hospital ? [MASK] [end] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Ca n't you tell me what floor ? src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Where can I get information ? # request ( location ( reception ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) [start] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lift ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LC : For the lift ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) LC : Thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around , have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( cafe ) ) ; request ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ; G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) ARI : At 11 AM . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) [start] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] ARI : How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Where are the toilets ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Right or left ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )

src: LC : Hello . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )
tgt: ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . # inform ( appt ( general_info ) ) RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? # thank ( ) ; change-volume ( turn_up ) ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . # offer-help ( ) LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( )

[MASK] [MASK] RP : To de-stress . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Could we have a hot drink to relax a bit ? We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Well , great , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [end] RP : Ah great , thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( LC+RP , go_to ( ground_floor ) ) RP : Goodbye . # bye ( ) ARI : You 're welcome .
